article:
Long long ago a thief stole a bag of money from from a farmer's house. The _ went to the judge and asked _ help. The judge ordered _ the people of the farm to come before him. He took out a number of sticks of the same size and gave one stick to _ man. Then he said,"Come before me again tomorrow.I'll know which _ you is the thief, because the thief's stick will be one inch longer than the _ ."  The thief was afraid to be found out and so he cut an inch _ the stick.
The next day the thief's stick was found to be one inch _ than any other stick. _ this way the theif was found out and put into prison.
